General.Name: N2N Connect Bhd
General.Description: N2N Connect Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the research and development of software packages in Malaysia, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company provides design, programming, consultancy, sales, marketing, and related services. It offers Asia E-Broker, a trading platform; Asia Trading Hub, a network of brokers from across the region that are inter-connected through a unified trading platform; a trading platform that includes both front and back office functionalities, catering to multi-asset class, multi-market, and multi-currency trading; Information Terminal offers real time data from various markets and together with the latest fundamentals, news, analytics, charting, and communication tools; wealth and asset management solutions; algorithmic trading solutions; and Market Maker Solutions that provides a compliant and regulated multi-asset solution that generates liquidity and depth for financial markets. The company also provides connectivity solutions, such as dedicated internet access, leased lines, and international connectivity services; network security solutions, including web app firewalls, SIEM, IPS, VPN, and DDoS protection; data center which offers server hosting, management, and colocation services; and enterprise application and hardware solutions, including VoIP and IT application and hardware services. In addition, the company offers professional training services for remisiers and related fields; on-line stock market information, on-line securities trading systems, and business solutions; Webpage and server design services; information technology system and solutions services to online internet platforms; online financial information; and infrastructure for hosting, data processing services, and related activities. Further, it sells and maintains microcomputers; and sells computer hardware and software. N2N Connect Berhad was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
